body.p: Furthermore, the IASB decided that an entity should be permitted to apply Clarifications to IFRS 15 earlier than its effective date. This would allow an entity the choice of either:

li.p: applying Clarifications to IFRS 15 on the same date as it first applies IFRS 15; or
applying Clarifications to IFRS 15 at a date later than when it early applies IFRS 15.

body.p: In other words, an entity that has decided to early apply IFRS 15 would have the flexibility to apply Clarifications to IFRS 15 either together with the Standard or at a subsequent date.
